channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Pedestrian Fatality; INC#1600; 09:11PM; 700 N Fries Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46MjdMr; #Wilmington; PRELIM: 36 year-old male reportedly in the roadway, possibly igniting fireworks when struck by a sport utility vehicle. Thrown a distance, he landed partially beneath but was not trapped by another vehicle exiting a shopping center parking lot. The man was determined deceased and remains at the scene. No other persons injured. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #4195) and Medical Examiner.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E38 E49 E85 EM13 HR3 RA101 RA85 T38; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#1431; 08:01PM; 7719 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XBx5EN; #StudioCity; Despite volatile brush burning in steep terrain fanned by light winds, the first arriving 30 LAFD ground responders aided by precise helicopter water drops, were able to confine flames to one-quarter (0.25) acre of light-to-heavy brush in 45 minutes. No injury. No structure threat. No structure damage. No evacuation. Firefighters will remain at the scene for the next hour-and-a-half to complete extinguishment and mop up. Though witnesses vividly describe the earlier illegal use of personal fireworks in the area, the specific cause of the fire remains the focus of an active LAFD investigation.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 BC14 CE59 E108 E278 E41 E52 E76 E97 EM14 H3 H4 H6 HA3 HA4 HA6 T78; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1431; 07:16PM; 7719 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XBx5EN; #StudioCity; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to 30' x 50' light-to-heavy brush burning slowly downhill in steep terrain. Winds out of southwest at 7 MPH. No imminent structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 E108 E260 E278 E41 E76 E86 E90 E97 EM14 H3 H4 H6 HA3 HA4 HA6 T60 T78; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Hiker Rescue; INC#0496; 10:15AM; Rim of The Valley Trail; MAP: https://bit.ly/438jPc3; #Tujunga; The ill hiker, now described as a 44 year-old female in fair condition, is adamantly refusing hospital transport. Given her remote location near Mount Lukens, the hovering LAFD rescue helicopter will hoist her aboard and transport her to a safe location at the base of the San Gabriel Mountains, where she will again be offered transportation via a ground-based LAFD ambulance, or be required to confirm her refusal of continued care. ; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 E24 E274 E290 E6 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA74 RA90 RH114 T74 T90; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0496; 09:38AM; Rim of The Valley Trail; MAP: https://bit.ly/438jPc3; #Tujunga; PRELIM: LAFD Ground and Air response to a 30 year-old female hiker in undetermined condition, following a sudden onset of chest pain and altered level of consciousness while traversing a remote section of Rim of The Valley Trail near Mount Lukens in the San Gabriel Mountains. An LAFD rescue helicopter has located the patient, and lowered a Flight Paramedic to complete a primary medical assessment, provide initial care, and prepare her to be hoisted aboard the hovering helicopter for in-flight care during direct air transport to a regional hospital.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 E24 E274 E290 E6 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA74 RH114 T74 T90; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Illness; INC#1363; 06:57PM; LAX Terminal 2; MAP: https://bit.ly/44dW97C; #Westchester; PRELIM: 6 crew members ( Two Pilots / 4 Flight Attendants ) from an arriving single-aisle commercial passenger jet that had already deplaned passengers, were found standing on a jetway, complaining of headaches after they noted an odor (they surmise to be aircraft exhaust) within the aircraft after landing. The odor had dissipated upon airline ground crew and LAFD arrival. LAFD responders closely examined the aircraft cabin and cockpit with specialized instruments, and found no environmental hazard. One of the crew members has declined transportation, the other five are now being taken to an area hospital by LAFD ambulance in fair condition for further observation. Media Inquiries: LAX Operations.; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E263 E62 E67 EM9 RA5 RA62 RA837 RA864 RA867 SQ21 T5 T63; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1275; 07:03PM; 13100 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NBDjQp; #BeverlyCrest; Solo vehicle (overturned?) with five occupants total, two of whom were ejected. Three were transported to area hospitals by LAFD Paramedics, and two declined transportation and remain at scene. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Incident #3304; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E278 E99 EM14 EM17 EM9 RA78 RA837 RA858 RA860 RA97 RA99 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1275; 06:15PM; 13100 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NBDjQp; #BeverlyCrest; Solo vehicle (overturned?) with five occupants, two of whom were ejected. The three others have lesser injuries. Details pending.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E278 E99 EM14 EM17 EM9 RA78 RA837 RA860 RA97 RA99 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#1275; 05:57PM; 13100 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NBDjQp; #BeverlyCrest; PRELIM: Traffic collision. Possibly with two ejected patients.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E99 EM14 RA78 RA858 RA99; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1186; 05:30PM; 7227 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XDhDYP; #ManchesterSquare; The first arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters mounted a quick and well-coordinated fire attack, confining flames within one business in the central section of a one-story L-shaped commercial building, extinguishing the fire in just 25 minutes. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E221 E233 E266 E33 E57 E64 E66 EM13 RA266 RA66 RA866 SQ21 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey
